H0.text: Which Norwegian explorer was the founder of the Nordic settlement in Greenland in the 10th century. Leif Erikson's Uncle

H1.text: Which Norwegian explorer was the founder of the Nordic settlement in Greenland in the 10th century. Olaf Trygvesson

H2.text: Which Norwegian explorer was the founder of the Nordic settlement in Greenland in the 10th century. Bjarni Herjolfsson

H3.text: Which Norwegian explorer was the founder of the Nordic settlement in Greenland in the 10th century. Eric Raude

A4.text: Erik the Red is widely credited to be the first known, and successful, permanent settler of Greenland.

A5.text: Erik... founded the first successful European settlement on the island.
